title: Simple Chat Game  
description: Give Points & Check Leaders And Winner(s) 


# Import Code
```text

``` 

# Installation
Just Import the code above, Enable commands.

# Configuration

|Commands|Purpose|
|---|---|
|`!startGame`|initialize the Game -> Enable !joinGame & !givePts Commands (erase scoreBoard datas)| 
|`!joinGame`|Any user can join at anytime during the game |
|`!givePts # @userName`|add number of points to give next to the command , then @ the user to give them|
|`!getAllScores`|display current state of leader board for all players  ( one for each lines ) avoid if too many users|
|`!winner`|return the highest score|
